text: Takuya Miyamoto (8 July 1983 - 1 May 2022) was a Japanese football player. He played for Montedio Yamagata. Miyamoto died in an accident on 1 May 2022 at the age of 38.U-15コーチ宮本卓也氏ご逝去のお知らせ ==Club career statistics== |- |2006||rowspan="2"|Cerezo Osaka||J. League 1||15||0||0||0||0||0||15||0 |- |2007||J.
